The Blue Jays have given up 1,098 hits (8.4 per 9 innings) as well as 576 earned runs.
The Blue Jays have a fielding percentage of.984 which puts them in 24th in pro baseball.
Bassitt (71-54 career mark) has a FIP of 3.56 and has gone up against 4,548 opposing batters in the majors.
